snap(15,15,-20)

sky(255,0,0)
fog(255,128,0)
ground(255,255,0)
polys(255,255,128)

fadefrom(6000)
density(4)

name(Don't Play With The Fire)
nlaps(8)

set(47,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,0)
set(26,0,8400,0)pr
set(10,0,11200,0)p
set(10,0,16800,0)
set(10,0,22400,0)p
set(10,0,28000,0)
set(14,0,32500,0)pt
chk(40,2000,32500,90)
set(10,4500,32500,90)
set(14,9000,32500,-90)pt
chk(40,9000,30500,180)
set(10,9000,28000,0)
set(14,9000,23500,180)pt
chk(40,7000,23500,-90)
set(10,4500,23500,90)
set(10,-1100,23500,90)p
set(10,-6700,23500,90)
set(26,-8200,23500,90)pr
set(10,-12300,23500,90)p
set(26,-16400,23500,90)pr
set(10,-17900,23500,90)
set(10,-23500,23500,90)p
set(10,-29100,23500,90)
set(14,-33600,23500,90)pt
chk(40,-33600,25500,0)
set(10,-33600,28000,0)
set(14,-33600,32500,0)pt
chk(40,-31600,32500,90)
set(10,-29100,32500,90)
set(14,-24600,32500,-90)pt
chk(40,-24600,30500,180)
set(10,-24600,28000,0)
set(10,-24600,22400,0)p
set(10,-24600,16800,0)
set(10,-24600,11200,0)p
set(26,-24600,8400,180)pr
set(10,-24600,5600,0)
set(10,-24600,0,0)p

set(10,-24600,-5600,0)
set(26,-24600,-8400,180)pr
set(10,-24600,-11200,0)p
set(10,-24600,-16800,0)
set(14,-24600,-21300,180)pt
chk(40,-26600,-21300,-90)
set(10,-29100,-21300,90)
set(14,-33600,-21300,90)pt
chk(40,-33600,-19300,0)
set(10,-33600,-16800,0)
set(14,-33600,-12300,0)pt
chk(40,-31600,-12300,90)
set(10,-29100,-12300,90)
set(10,-23500,-12300,90)p
set(10,-17900,-12300,90)
set(26,-16400,-12300,-90)pr
set(10,-12300,-12300,90)p
set(26,-8200,-12300,-90)pr
set(10,-6700,-12300,90)
set(10,-1100,-12300,90)p
set(10,4500,-12300,90)
set(14,9000,-12300,-90)pt
chk(40,9000,-14300,180)
set(10,9000,-16800,0)
set(14,9000,-21300,180)pt
chk(40,7000,-21300,-90)
set(10,4500,-21300,90)
set(14,0,-21300,90)pt
chk(40,0,-19300,0)
set(10,0,-16800,0)
set(10,0,-11200,0)p
set(26,0,-8400,0)pr
set(10,0,-5600,0)

set(24,-18450,-8400,0)
set(15,-18450,-5600,180)
set(15,-18450,0,0)
set(16,-18450,5600,0)
set(15,-18450,11200,0)
set(15,-18450,16800,0)
set(24,-18450,19600,0)

set(24,-12300,-8400,0)po
set(15,-12300,-5600,180)
set(15,-12300,0,0)p
set(34,-12300,1800,180)
set(16,-12300,5600,0)
fix(41,-12300,5600,-2000,0)s
set(34,-12300,9400,0)
set(15,-12300,11200,0)p
set(15,-12300,16800,0)
set(24,-12300,19600,0)po

set(24,-6150,-8400,0)
set(15,-6150,-5600,180)
set(15,-6150,0,0)
set(16,-6150,5600,0)
set(15,-6150,11200,0)
set(15,-6150,16800,0)
set(24,-6150,19600,0)

maxr(15,11000,-24000)
maxt(10,40000,-34000)
maxl(15,-36000,-24000)
maxb(10,-25400,-34000)
